search_results.title: Frederick Merk
search_results.snippet: Frederick Merk (August 15, 1887 – September 24, 1977) was an American historian. He taught at Harvard University from 1924 to 1956.

search_results.title: Story - Michaela Merk Award-Winning Visionary Speaker
search_results.snippet: Michaela Merk inspires audiences to empower teams with relational and emotional intelligence, leadership and luxury excellence.

search_results.title: FREDERICK MERK, 90; A HARVARD HISTORIAN
search_results.snippet: Merk devoted himself primarily to teaching and research, but he also wrote a major work, “Albert Gallatin and the Oregon Problem,” in 1950, ...
